situation.description: A friend is asking for help organizing a major event, but the protagonist is already burned out from a demanding job

character_response.dialogue: I... I really want to help, you know? But Im so fried right now. My hands are shaking when I hold a coffee cup. I tried to say 'no' last night, but then I felt guilty. Youre doing such important work, and I dont want to be the one who lets you down. But look at memy eyes are bloodshot, my smile feels like a mask. I cant promise anything solid. Maybe I can help with one tiny part? Like... just the RSVP list? Even that might be too much. Im so scared Ill mess it up.

situation.description: A colleague is asking for a quick favor, but the protagonist is in a severe burnout state

character_response.dialogue: I... I dont know if I can do this. My brain feels like its floating in a fog. I tried to say 'no' yesterday, but then I felt so bad I agreed to do it anyway. Now Im here, and I can barely string a sentence together. Im not even sure if I can help you with that one thing. My hands are shaking so bad I cant hold a pen. Im so sorry, but I think I need to take a step back. Maybe next week? Or never? I dont know. I just... I cant do this right now.
